nodes.text: Star Wars Mythos was a project set to be released by Sideshow Collectibles, taking five characters from the Star Wars universe and focusing on them as legends and epic characters in the form of a statue, a collection of artwork and a non-canon backstory for each. The characters included are Ben Kenobi, Darth Maul, Darth Vader, Boba Fett and a Gamorrean named Lomrokk. The project introduced new characters in Bounty #239 and some Trandoshan twins. The release of the series was to begin with Darth Maul.
Sideshow Collectibles had to stop the line, due to the change in Star Wars canon and franchise direction, following Lucasfilm Ltd. acquisition by The Walt Disney Company in late 2012.

However, on July 20, 2018, during the Star Wars Collectibles Panel at San Diego Comic-Con, Sideshow Collectibles revealed that they would be reviving the series because fans loved Sideshow’s take on a post-Revenge of the Sith Obi-Wan in the Mythos line.
